landing.title: Landing Page
landing.desc: A Landing Page is a destination page designed specifically to turn visitors into customers. It is used for marketing campaigns, ads, or promoting products and services.
list: Ideal for ads on Google, Facebook, or Instagram.
Clean design focused on a single action (signup, purchase, call, etc.).
Fast loading and SEO optimization to attract clients.
landing.ideal: Who is it for? Entrepreneurs, small businesses, events, and product launches.

corporate.title: Corporate Website
corporate.desc: A Corporate Website represents a company's identity. Includes sections like 'Home', 'About Us', 'Services', 'Contact'.
list: Attracts clients with clear and structured information.
Can include blogs, testimonials, and contact forms.
corporate.ideal: Who is it for? Companies, professionals, and businesses needing an online presence.

ecommerce.title: Online Store (E-commerce)
ecommerce.desc: An Online Store allows you to sell products or services with online payments. Includes inventory management, orders, and more.
list: Integration with payment gateways (PayPal, Stripe, MercadoPago, etc.).
Admin panel to manage products and orders.
ecommerce.ideal: Who is it for? Businesses wanting to sell products or digital goods automatically.
